graph_title: Number of countries with sustainable consumption and production (SCP) national action plans or SCP mainstreamed as a priority or a target into national policies
indicator_name: Number of countries with sustainable consumption and production (SCP) national action plans or SCP mainstreamed as a priority or a target into national policies
target_name: Implement the 10‐Y<small>EAR</small> F<small>RAMEWORK OF</small> P<small>ROGRAMMES ON</small> S<small>USTAINABLE</small> C<small>ONSUMPION AND</small> P<small>RODUCTION</small> P<small>ATTERNS</small>, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries
